segments.advisor_message: So, uh, can you tell me about your, like, current living situation? Do ya own your place or is it, um, rented?
segments.client_message: Oh, I actually, um, I rent my place. It's, uh, a two-bedroom flat in the center of, you know, the town. Just by the park and all that, it's nice, I guess. Umm, I live on, uh, Park Avenue, number 50.

segments.advisor_message: Nice, nice! Gotcha. And, um, do you know your postcode or ZIP code? Just so we can, ya know, get the details all sorted out.
segments.client_message: Yeah, it's, uh, 12345, right in the heart of the city. I moved in here about six months ago, I think, in, like, April or so, if that helps.
